title: Food web in a meadow community

content.question: Which of the following changes to the environment will most likely lead to more energy entering the meadow community represented above?

choices.label: Increasing the number of nesting sites for hawks and owls
Increasing the light available to the plants
Applying a chemical pesticide that is specific for spiders

content.answer: Increasing the light available to the plants

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
